name: 30DC
overview: 30DC Inc is leveraging its Internet Marketing expertise by building a significant online social community. 30DC Inc’s business is driven by continuously expanding its community of members who have grown from 1,000 in 2005 to 80,000 in 2009 to in excess of 91,000 in 2010. 30DC Inc’s experience in the Internet marketing and its ability to evaluate and operate successful online businesses positions the company to provide cutting edge traffic generation solutions and web site marketing strategies and provides Potential growth of 30DC Inc’s social community from the current approximately 91,000 members In addition 30DC Inc intends to supplement its community growth by acquiring related businesses in Web 2.0 marketing, information products publishing and other online application businesses.
